info.name: Sonarr Dark / night mode
info.description:
Dark gray theme for the PVR system Sonarr.
Just install the style: no need to modify URL if you are using the default port (8989).
info.additionalInfo:
20161113 Fixed Overview list font color
         Fixed Add icon color in settings
         Improved Posters view
         Improved Settings modal windows colors
20161103-2 Fixed release rejections popup colors
20161103-1 Initial release
